fields.description: When running an app in iPhone 6 simulator using SDK 3.4 and CLI 3.4, platformHeight returns the *old* (iPhone 5) platformHeight of 568 points.
fields.summary: PlatformHeight reports errornous value on iphone 6
fields.environment:
- xcode 6.0.1
- CLI version 3.4.0-rc4, Titanium SDK version 3.4.0.v20140916181713
